_header: That blissful bairn in Bethlehem born
_description: The Virtues of the Mass — 281 5-line stanzas

BodAddA268.First Lines:
That blesset barn in ledlem borneþat let his brayne be thrille
                    with thorneffor mones mysdedeLet neuer þer saules thurȝ syn
                    be lorne…
BodAddA268.Last Lines: …That barne best bryng vs to blisWith hym to belde

BLRoy17Cxvii.First Lines:
[Þ]At blyssful barme in bedlem borneþat lete hys brayne
                    be thyrled with thorneffor mans myd dede…
BLRoy17Cxvii.Last Lines:
…he pyght saynt clement a pope I wyusþat barne best bryng
                    vs to blyswyt hym to beyldNow as I wretyn to more &
                    lesseVycis[?] & vertus of þe messeAls wele as þat I
                    kanffor my syght es ay warsseþer for blame me no man

YaleBei317.First Lines:
That blyssyd childe yn bedlem bornþat suffred his brayn be
                    þirlyd with þornffor mannys mysdede…
YaleBei317.Last Lines:
…The childe þat best ys brynge vs to blys with hym to
                    byelde
YaleBei317.Attributed Title:
Here folowyth þe medys and grace þat is gevyn vnto theym þat
                    devoutly heryth þe masse (f. 22); Explicit modus audiendi missam cum
                        indulgencia eiusdem Deo gracias (f. 27v)
